works.title: Smart Inventory System
works.summary: Web-based inventory management system with real-time tracking and analytics features
works.description: An inventory management application that helps businesses track stock, manage orders, and analyze sales performance in real-time.

works.title: HealthMate
works.summary: Mobile health application for tracking physical activities and daily nutrition
works.description: A mobile application that helps users achieve their health goals with activity tracking, nutrition, and routine reminder features.

works.title: TaskFlow
works.summary: Project management application with team collaboration and time tracking features
works.description: A project management platform that enables teams to collaborate effectively with kanban board, time tracking, and progress reporting features.

works.title: AI Customer Service Chatbot
works.summary: AI-powered chatbot for customer service automation
works.description: A chatbot that uses AI technology to provide 24/7 customer service with context understanding and relevant response capabilities.

works.title: EcoTrack
works.summary: Personal carbon footprint tracking application with eco-friendly recommendations
works.description: An application that helps users understand and reduce their carbon footprint through daily activity tracking and eco-friendly lifestyle recommendations.

works.title: EduLearn LMS
works.summary: Online learning platform with interactive features and progress tracking
works.description: A Learning Management System that provides interactive learning experiences with video conferencing, online quizzes, and learning progress tracking features.

works.title: FinTech Wallet
works.summary: Digital wallet with personal finance management features
works.description: A digital wallet application that enables users to manage finances, conduct transactions, and analyze expenses easily.

works.title: Smart Home Hub
works.summary: IoT platform for smart home device control and monitoring
works.description: A smart home control system that allows users to control and monitor IoT devices in their homes through mobile or web applications.

works.title: Food Delivery Platform
works.summary: Food delivery platform with real-time tracking and rating system
works.description: A food delivery application that connects customers with local restaurants, featuring real-time tracking and rating system.
